ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Avoiding faction hits in PoG when pulling
ygData.msgSnippet: hehe i did the same thing, Moon... But i was just thinking, as scary as it may be... You know some quests are level dependent.. I was hailing anything i could
ygData.messageBody:
hehe i did the same thing, Moon... But i was just thinking, as scary as it
may be... You know some quests are level dependent.. I was hailing anything
i could see at L52, I haven't seen your level lately, but could it be 55 or
so is the minimum for the quest mobs to cough up more than a kind look? It
didn't occur to me while I was wandering about the plane, but this could be
something to consider. Who of our higher level non-kos'd members here have
tried hailing things? Anyone 55+ by chance? Just some thoughts.
